description: Insurance is a crucial safety net that protects you and your family from financial hardship due to unforeseen events. It's about managing risk and ensuring peace of mind.
sentences: Health insurance is non-negotiable to cover rising medical costs.
Term life insurance provides a large cover for a low premium, protecting your dependents.
Always disclose all information accurately when buying a policy to avoid claim rejection.
Review your insurance coverage periodically, especially after major life events.
Don't mix insurance and investment; buy pure term plans and invest the difference.
dos: Buy a health insurance policy as early as possible.
Get adequate life insurance cover if you have financial dependents.
Read the policy document carefully before purchasing.
Inform your family members about the policies you have.
donts: Don't rely solely on your employer's group health insurance.
Don't buy insurance just to save tax.
Avoid traditional plans (endowment, money-back) which offer low returns.
